Enter your address
We'll tell you if India Samraat delivers to you. Login | Make this a takeout order
e.g. , "1 Main St, Boston, MA"
Welcome to the superb Indian Cuisine.
Our delivery is always FREE when purchased online! Please note that delivery time may take between 45 and 90 minutes.
Browse Top Rated Most Popular Recommendations
Free Delivery! Delivery minimum: $20 (4:16pm-9:30pm) Delivery minimum: $50 (10:45am-4:15pm) Location on map 51a Massachusetts Ave Boston, MA 02115 Delivery Hours: Mon-Sat: 10:45am-9:30pm Sun: 4pm-9:30pm
Takeout Hours: Mon-Sat: 11:30am-2pm&4:30pm-9:30pm Sun: 2:45pm-9:30pm
Bonus Points: Triple points Every day
My Order
Choose items for your order by picking a category on the left. $20 Delivery minimum:
Invite people to join this order, or order for them. Earn double points! Enter a promo code:
To use, click a coupon or leave it to us . 15% Instant Rebate Get a 15% instant rebate as FoodlerBucks with your first order from this restaurant. 10% off Get 10% off any order of $100 or more. 15% off Get 15% off any order of $200 or more. 20% off Get 20% off any order of $400 or more. $4 off Get $4 off any order of $40 or more.
Best Bets 1. Chicken Tikka Masala 2. Naan 3. Vegetable Samosa (2 pieces) 4. Garlic Naan 5. Saag Paneer 6. Plain Rice 7. Meat Samosa (2 pieces) 8. Mango - Lassi 9. Chicken Vindaloo 10. Raita
